description: Home dashboard with the most important infrastructure indicators for your node and docker machine.

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

panels.description: Percentage of successful queries per chain in the last minute
panels.title: Queries success

panels.description: Number of peers currently being benched (ignored) by the node
panels.title: Benched nodes

panels.description: Basic network info per interface
panels.title: Network Traffic Basic

panels.description: Number of blocks/vertices currently being processed by the node
panels.title: Processing

panels.description: Number of blocks/vertices accepted in the last minute
panels.title: Accepted Blocks/Vertices

panels.description: Average time to get a response from a peer
panels.title: Network Latency

panels.description: Number of blocks this node has proposed on the C-Chain in the last day. Since C-Chain blocks are produced at a fast rate, block producers are selected by stake weight.
panels.title: Proposed C blocks

panels.description: Number of P-Chain blocks this node has proposed on the network in the last day. Since block production on P-Chain is usually below the target rate, every node proposes P blocks.
panels.title: Proposed P blocks

panels.description: Number of peers node is connected to
panels.title: Peer count

panels.description: Basic memory usage
panels.title: Memory Basic

panels.description: System uptime
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Total RAM
panels.title: RAM Total

panels.description: Total number of CPU cores
panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description: How long each database operation is taking on average
panels.title: Database Operations Latency

panels.description: Number of currently failing internal health checks
panels.title: Failing health checks

panels.description: Number of accepted and rejected blocks on the C chain in the last minute.
panels.title: C Chain Blocks

panels.description: Amount of METAL currently staked
panels.title: Total staked

panels.description: Percentage of the stake that view your node as sufficiently online and correct to vote that node be awarded at the end of the staking period.
panels.title: Rewarding stake

panels.description: Number of accepted and rejected blocks on the P chain in the last minute.
panels.title: P Chain Blocks

panels.description: Number of accepted and rejected vertices on the X chain in the last minute
panels.title: X Chain Vertices

title: Layer 0 - Metal Blochchain
